q: Judge Louis Walsh confirmed both Simon Cowell and Cheryl Cole have quit the show in favour of working on the American version, leaving a spot free for Sharon Osbourne . Louis Walsh hinted to the News Of The World: It will be me and Dannii Minogue with two more people. Sharon Osbourne and Dannii Minogue first fell out when they both starred in the show in 2007, with Dannii Minogue later claiming she had been bullied. . Eric Schmidt said the fourth quarter marked a terrific end to a stellar year. Google reported revenues of$ 8.44 billion for the quarter, a 26 percent increase compared to the fourth quarter of 2009. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and, Eric Schmidt said.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.'' His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan.`` He's my first Division I recruit,'' the Albert said of Jarrell McKinney . He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves.
